src:
Turismo Carretera
Mariano Werner, de punta a punta en Toay

04 Nov 2019, 00:36

El entrerriano Mariano Werner, con Ford, ganó ayer de punta a punta la final del Turismo Carretera (TC), en el marco de la decimocuarta fecha del campeonato de la especialidad, y cuarta de la Copa de Oro, que se corrió en el autódromo “Provincia de La Pampa” de Toay.
El oriundo de Paraná, Mariano Werner, superó al arrecifeño Agustín Canapino (Chevrolet), que pasó a encabezar la Copa de Oro, y al loberense Jonatan Castellano (Dodge), al cabo de las 30 vueltas al circuito de 4.184 metros.
text:
Road Tourism
Mariano Werner, from end to end in Toay

04 Nov 2019, 00:36

The entrerriano Mariano Werner, with Ford, won from end to end the final of the Tourism Road (TC), within the framework of the fourteenth date of the specialty championship, and fourth of the Gold Cup, which ran at the racetrack “Province of La Pampa” of Toay.
The native of Paraná, Mariano Werner, surpassed the reef Agustín Canapino (Chevrolet), who went on to head the Gold Cup, and the Jonatan Castellano (Dodge), after 30 laps to the 4,184 meter circuit.
